meanings.definition: A small blister or bubble on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The bleb on his hand popped when he accidentally hit it.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a tiny bleb forming on her sunburned shoulder.
meanings.sent3: The bleb on his nose made him look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter created a bleb of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The bleb on the water surface sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A small rounded mass of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The chef added a bleb of butter to the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed a bleb of oil floating in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The bleb of paint on the canvas gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: The bleb of happiness in her heart grew with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The bleb of ice cream on top of the pie melted quickly.
